_c1: Each bone needs an entry here in order to tie together the invocation name, the actual file to execute,
_c2: and the intents it will act upon.
_c3: name=Title or name for the bone
_c5: invocationName=Single word the user will use when fetching the bone: fetch metro
_c6: intents=Array of intents that the bone will respond to, at a minimum it should act on FetchIntent
